def.dt: :a job or profession that someone does for a long time I want to make teaching my career. = I want to have a career as a teacher. [=I want to be a teacher] She hopes to pursue a career in medicine. often used before another noun He was a career diplomat/soldier. [=he was a diplomat/soldier for all or most of his working life]
:a period of time spent in a job or profession My career as a waitress lasted one day. During his long career in advertising he won numerous awards and honors.
